description: This file provides React context and hooks for managing notes in a note-taking application's frontend. It defines the context, provider component, and functions for creating, updating, deleting notes, and managing tags, filters, and sorting.

methods.name: useNotes
methods.description: Custom hook to access the notes context, ensuring it is used within a NotesProvider.

methods.name: NotesProvider
methods.description: React component that provides the notes context to its children, managing state and CRUD operations for notes.
